column2: Name and Surname of the compiler

column16: Site latitude (in degrees. Positive northern Hemisphere, negative southern Hemisphere Example: 44.78)
column17: Site longitude (in degrees. Positive eastern Hemisphere, negative western  Hemisphere Example: 44.78)
column18: Do you have an available Life Cycle Assessment (LCA)?
column19: LCA value [kgCO2Eq] (please use dot for decimals i.e. 18.4 NOT 18,4). If you do not have it, corresponding to the previous answer "no" please write -9999
